description:
AutoCAD is computer-aided design (CAD) software that is used for precise 2D and 3D drafting, design, and modeling with solids, surfaces, mesh objects, documentation features, and more. It includes features to automate tasks and increase productivity such as comparing drawings, counting, adding objects, and creating tables. It also comes with seven industry-specific toolsets for electrical design, plant design, architecture layout drawings, mechanical design, 3D mapping, adding scanned images, and converting raster images. AutoCAD enables users to create, edit, and annotate drawings via desktop, web, and mobile devices.

#### System requirements for AutoCAD 2024
Operating System: 64-bit Microsoft® Windows® 11 and Windows 10 version 1809 or above.

#### Package Parameters
The following package parameters can be set (choose only one!):
 * `/ChineseSimp:` - Install Simplified Chinese language version
 * `/ChineseTrad:` - Install Traditional Chinese language version
 * `/Czech:` - Install Czech language version
 * `/French:` - Install French language version
 * `/German:` - Install German language version
 * `/Hungarian:` - Install Hungarian language version
 * `/Italian:` - Install Italian language version
 * `/Japanese:` - Install Japanese language version
 * `/Korean:` - Install Korean language version
 * `/Polish:` - Install Polish language version
 * `/Portuguese:` - Install Brazilian Portuguese language version
 * `/Russian:` - Install Russian language version
 * `/Spanish:` - Install Spanish language version
 * If no parameter is given the English language version will be installed.

To pass parameters, use `--params "''"` (e.g. `choco install autocad --params="'/ChineseSimp'"`).
To have choco remember parameters on upgrade, be sure to set `choco feature enable -n=useRememberedArgumentsForUpgrades`.
author: Autodesk
